summary: Jimbo is 13 and can think of only one girl -- Sarah Jane. And no matter what stands in his way-bullies, violence, chaos, or zombies-nothing will stop him from finding a way into her world.
cast: Brad Ashby|Mia Wasikowska|Vladimir Matovic|Beau South|Peter Yacoub|Richard Mueck|Anton Enus
keywords: bobby pin|love|tween girl|13 year old|bully comeuppance
title: Quiero a Sarah Jane
